title: All My Love
lyrics:
I'm taking you back, I'm taking you back
Here's another one
Uh (Uh, yeah)
I remember being on that nigga's shit hard (Uh)
Back in the days in the projects (Uh-huh)
Chasing after him, a lil' young chick (Yeah)
Seeing him made me go back in my lab and write this lil' shit like this, check it out (Check it, uh)

Here's how it goes, used to see you when I went to the store
Always watch you play ball from my bedroom window
And the places you frequent, the chicks you freaked with
The spot in the grass where you kept your stash
Used to wonder to myself if you felt my eyes
If you ever noticed me and knew I was alive
Tried to draw your attention, wore dresses to my thighs
With hopes to get close to you
Used to dream about you right before I went to sleep
Used to wake up on the morning hugging the sheets (That's right)
Used to practice what I'd say for the day that we'd meet
Used to pray every day for the day that we'd meet
Used to hang with your sis, if she only knew (That's right)
I only hung with that bitch to get closer to you (Yeah)
Wasn't no limit to the things I would do
To give all my love to you, my God (Yo, E)

Can't feel myself
Don't want nobody else to ever love you (Right)
You are my shining star
My guiding light, my love fantasy (Yeah, oh yeah)
There's not a minute, hour (Check)
Day or night I don't love you (That's right)
You're at the top of my list
'Cause I'm always thinking of you (Take it to the bridge)

All my love (Uh, uh)
('Cause all my love's to you, my God)
A thousand kisses from you (Uh-huh)
And it wasn't enough (Right)
(I'm taking you back, I'm taking you back, with another one)
I just don't wanna stop, too much, never too much (Yeah, uh-huh, yeah)
Never too much, never too much (Queen Pen, take it to the Brooklyn Bridge)

Stopped being by yourself, now you hung with a crew
I took the bangs out my hair over the summer, I grew
Me and my friends, all virgins, all learning
How to throw that shit, how to blow that shit
Talked about that sex like I was used to it
Lied about how many you used to kiss
In the hallways, all day, 'til it was real
In the staircase, lights out, gettin' our feels (Oh, how it used to be)
Wrote your name in my notebook, we all did that
Lined our names up with numbers to see if they matched (That's right)
Scared to death 'bout the first time, I knew it would hurt
In your house, on your mother's couch, she was at work
Dead wrong, but headstrong, ya had me sprung
The only one I ever loved ever since I was young
Once in a while I even cut school
To give all my love to you, my God (Yo, E)

Can't feel myself
Don't want nobody else to ever love you (That's right)
You are my shining star
My guiding light, my love fantasy (Uh-huh, you know)
There's not a minute, hour
Day or night I don't love you (No Doubt)
You're at the top of my list
'Cause I'm always thinking of you (Yeah)

All my love (Uh)
('Cause all my love's to you, my God)
A thousand kisses from you (Right, right)
And it wasn't enough
(I'm taking you back, I'm taking you back, here's another one)
I just don't wanna stop, too much, never too much
Never too much, never too much (Uh, the breakdown)
(Now bounce to this)

Yeah, dedicated to the first love (Right)
Uh, you know who you are (Uh-huh)
From the hood, it's all good (Yeah, uh-huh), yeah
We gon' bounce to this, uh
We make moves with this 'cause all my love's to you
Now bounce
